title: Integrating JEDI and AO Concepts in Medical Education: A Mathematics-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and general understanding of healthcare environments
context.additional_context: Short-term course combining JEDI (Justice, Equity, Diversity, Inclusion) and AO (Anti-Oppression) concepts in medical education with mathematical frameworks for non-degree learners

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design equitable decision-making models by applying JEDI principles in medical data analysis.
Learners will identify and adjust social bias elements using statistical techniques that incorporate the AO (Awareness of Bias) concept.
Learners will explain methods to evaluate cultural safety and inclusivity in healthcare resource allocation through mathematical modeling.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
